text: kya (hazrath) Yaqub ke inteqaal ke waqth tum maujod thein? jab unhone apni aulaad ko kaha ke mere baadh tum kis ki ibdath karoge? to sab ne jawaab diya ke aap ke maboodh ki aur aap ke aaba wa ajdaad Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) aur Ismail (alaihissalaam) aur Ishaq (alaihissalaam) ke maboodh ki, jo maboodh ek hee hai aur hum osi ke farmabardaar rahenge
